oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Coca-Cola - Country and Western radio jingles - 1971
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various radio jingles for Coca-Cola, featuring Loretta Lynn (performer), Conway Twitty (performer), Sonny James (performer), and Dottie West (performer), recorded in 1971.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Loretta Lynn; Conway Twitty; Sonny James; Dottie West
